summary: Simply makes the rain a bit louder.
descriptionHtml:
Louder Rain for Skyrim.

Have you ever noticed that the rain is barely audible in Skyrim? Like, it will be pouring down rain and it sounds only like a light sprinkle? I did. 
Basically, this mod amplifies the rain a little bit, so you can actually hear it. 
When it rains outside IRL, I can hear it quite easily, so I made it the same in Skyrim. 

[youtube]54EdoTNT9ZQ[/youtube]

There is now another version for users of More Rain (or mods similar). I personally use the MoreRainWindy66Percent.esp and the sounds are tailored towards that, so if you don\'t use that file the sounds may be a bit loud! 

Installation:
Copy the Sound folder to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data and merge files. Overwrite files if prompted.


Thanks to Audacity and BSAopt which allowed me to do this.
author: Billyro
